text: William Dawson "Bill" Gunter Jr. (July 16, 1934 - April 8, 2024) was an American politician. He was born in Jacksonville, Florida. Gunter was a member of the Democratic Party. Gunter represented Florida in the United States House of Representatives from the 5th district from 1973 through 1975. From 1976 through 1989, Gunter was Treasurer, Insurance Commissioner, and Fire Marshal of Florida. He unsuccessfully ran for the Democratic rally for the United States Senate three times, all were failed candidacies. Gunter died on April 8, 2024, at his home in Tallahassee, Florida at the age of 89. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1934 births Category:2024 deaths Category:United States representatives from Florida Category:Politicians from Jacksonville, Florida Category:Members of the Florida Legislature Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Bill Gunter
